actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend title VIII of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1964 to modify the computation of certain weighted student units.

summary.text: Amends title VIII (Impact Aid) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to revise a formula for computing certain weighted student units for purposes of basic support payments to local educational agencies for eligible federally connected children.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VIII of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1964 to modify the computation of certain weighted student units.
